content.micro: Most of the material on the Cyber.gov website is created by Federal employees, and you may reproduce, publish or otherwise use it without permission consistent with the Copyright Act of 1976. Please consider appropriate citation to Cyber.gov as the source. Copyrighted materials may also appear on this website, or may be reached through a link on this website. Copyright and other intellectual property laws may apply to your use of those materials. Images found on Cyber.gov were licensed for use by Cyber.gov from Noun Project, who may prohibit republication, retransmission, reproduction, or any other use of the images.
